Please note that this is a draft program and is subject to change. 


```{css, echo = FALSE}
.schedule-container {
  height: 100%;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 10% 45% 45%;
  grid-gap: 13px;
  grid-template-rows: 50px auto 50px;
}
.track, .break, .track1, .track2 {
  color: #fff;
  padding: 10px;
  box-shadow: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6) 1px 1px 0, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 4px 4px 0;
  grid-column: span 1;
}
.track, .break {
  grid-column: span 2;
  background-color: #c35500;
}
.track1, .track {
  background-color: #1259B2;
}
.track2 {
  background-color: #544D69;
}

```
